cards.name: Aha Moment
cards.text: +3 preparation

cards.name: Group Project
cards.text: +0.2 GPA. Alternatively, if you cannot play a card for action upon arrival on a space or location, you may discard this card as well as one other card from your hand.

cards.name: Successful Presentation
cards.text: -20 money, +4 preparation

cards.name: Curve Setter
cards.text: -1 Preparation. Pick a player to lose 0.1 GPA AND pick a player to lose 0.2 GPA.

cards.name: Pick on the Little Guy
cards.text: +1 Evil, +1 Preparation. A player of your choice draws a Life Card.

cards.name: Teacher's Pet
cards.text: -1 Evil, +1 preparation. Every player but you gains 1 Evil.

cards.name: Pop Quiz
cards.text: A player of your choice rolls a D6. 1, -0.2 GPA, -1 Morale. 2, -0.2 GPA. 3-4, -0.1 GPA. 5, nothing happens. 6, +0.1 GPA.

cards.name: More than Prepared
cards.text: For every Homework, Payday, and Classroom card (not including this one) in your hand, gain +2 preparation.

cards.name: Stream Osu!
cards.text: Roll D6. 1-2, +0 money. 3-4, +10 money. 5, +20 money. 6, +50 money

cards.name: Play Osu!
cards.text: +1 preparation. If you have >5 morale, +1 more preparation.

cards.name: Sick Roommate
cards.text: A player of your choice discards all their Classroom, Homework, and Social cards. Gain +10 money for each card discarded.

cards.name: Overnight Storm
cards.text: All players (including you) lose 2 preparation. Gain +5 money for each preparation discarded.

cards.name: Abandoned Notebook
cards.text: +2 preparation, a player of your choice loses 0.1 GPA

cards.name: All Nighter
cards.text: +0.1 GPA, -3 morale

cards.name: Bedroom Romp
cards.text: +5 morale. Next turn, roll a D10. If >=7, then in 9 rounds, you start to pay -20 money for the next 20 rounds. If <7, then nothing happens.

cards.name: Productive Individual
cards.text: For every Work Office, Homework, Social, and Dormitory card (not including this one) in your hand, gain +1 preparation.

cards.name: Snooping
cards.text: Choose an opponent. Look at their hand. For every Life or Vacation card in their hand, they must pay you 50 money, or gain 1 Evil if they cannot pay. Those cards are discarded.

cards.name: Play an MMO
cards.text: +3 morale. You can’t move for the next turn.

cards.name: Interview
cards.text: Discard the card from your hand with the most movement value. Get a job.

cards.name: Cutting Edge Technology
cards.text: Another player pays you 20 money and loses 0.1 GPA.

cards.name: Office Swag
cards.text: Draw 4 cards. Swap any cards from your hand with any of the drawn cards.

cards.name: VIP Invitation
cards.text: -60 money, +3 preparation, +0.1 GPA

cards.name: Daily Commute
cards.text: You may increase this card’s move value up to 6 by paying 4 money for each additional space moved.

cards.name: Overtime Pay
cards.text: +0.1 GPA, +20 money.

cards.name: Student Research
cards.text: +20 money, +2 prep.

cards.name: Promoted to Manager
cards.text: +1 morale. Each player must reveal to you the next card they draw.

cards.name: Advising Meeting
cards.text: Cycle cards until you find another one that can also be played on the Student Office. Play it immediately.

cards.name: Apply for Scholarship
cards.text: In three turns, roll a D6. If 1, get nothing. Otherwise, get (15*your roll) money.

cards.name: An Honest Snitch
cards.text: The player with the highest Evil (including you) must pay 50 money and 1 morale, or go to Office Hours if they cannot pay.

cards.name: Post-Exam Justice
cards.text: The player with the highest Evil must pay you 30 money and is sent to Office Hours. If players are tied for highest Evil, you pick the target.

cards.name: Class Trading
cards.text: Select another player to steal 0.1 GPA from.

cards.name: Student Advising
cards.text: Discard your hand. Draw (2*hand size) cards and choose (hand size) cards to keep. Discard the rest.

cards.name: Get Tutoring
cards.text: Purchase 1 or more preparation for 15 money each, up to 5 preparation.

cards.name: Talk to Financial Aid
cards.text: +25 money, +1 morale, +1 prep

cards.name: Summer Classes
cards.text: The player with the highest Evil (including you) must pay 50 money, 3 preparation, 2 morale, and 0.1 GPA. They are teleported to the Classroom.

cards.name: Biking: A Fit Solution
cards.text: +20 money if you use this card to move. Another player loses 0.4 GPA if played as an action card.

cards.name: Segfault
cards.text: Shuffle all players’ stats, re-deal every player’s hand, and randomly place every player somewhere on the game board.

cards.name: Roadtrip
cards.text: +3 morale. All players with <=6 morale lose 50 money, 3 preparation, and 0.1 GPA.

cards.name: Get a Massage
cards.text: +3 morale. Save this card to be used to take an extra turn at the time of your choosing.

cards.name: Assigned Driver
cards.text: You may teleport to any space or location. You may play a card on the spot you land, but you may not move again.

cards.name: A Night on the Town
cards.text: -10 money, +3 morale.

cards.name: Buy for the Group
cards.text: A player of your choice pays money equal to 20 times their Evil

cards.name: Bar Fight
cards.text: Pick two players (including yourself). Both players roll a D20. The player with the higher roll gains +1 morale, while the player with the lower roll loses 1 preparation and 0.2 GPA.

cards.name: Classy Drinker
cards.text: +40 money, +2 prep, +1 morale.

cards.name: Party Hard
cards.text: -30 money. Gain +1 preparation for each morale you have.

cards.name: Go Bowling
cards.text: +4 morale

cards.name: Hang with Coworkers
cards.text: +2 morale, +1 preparation

cards.name: Accident Avoidance
cards.text: You do not receive a Life card for landing on this space.

cards.name: Inevitable Consequence
cards.text: The player with the highest Evil (including you) loses 3 preparation.

cards.name: Academic Karma
cards.text: The player with the highest Evil (including you) loses 0.2 GPA.

cards.name: Better You than Me
cards.text: A player of your choice is sent to Office Hours. You do not receive a Life card.

cards.name: Food Sale
cards.text: Discard any number of cards from your hand and gain +5 money for each card discarded.

cards.name: Weekend Options
cards.text: Choose one: +3 preparation, +2 morale, or +0.1 GPA.

cards.name: BMOC
cards.text: All players pay you +10 money and +1 preparation.

cards.name: Sales Commission
cards.text: Gain +5 money for each Morale you have.

cards.name: Paycuts
cards.text: Choose a player. They roll as many D6s as they have Evil, and they lose 5 money for each die value rolled.

cards.name: Find a Dollar
cards.text: +1 money

cards.name: Carry the Team
cards.text: Show your hand to all players. Gain +2 money for each movement value displayed.

cards.name: Lecture Attendance
cards.text: This Homework space cannot send you to Office Hours.

cards.name: Collaboration
cards.text: Look at another player’s cards. Choose up to three cards from their hand to trade with cards from your hand.

cards.name: Diligence
cards.text: +3 preparation

cards.name: Confused Classmate
cards.text: A player of your choice loses 2 preparation.

cards.name: Study Grind
cards.text: If you have 0 preparation, +3 preparation.

cards.name: Find the Answer Online
cards.text: +1 evil, +2 preparation.

cards.name: Reading Quiz
cards.text: +2 prep

cards.name: Extra Credit Research
cards.text: +10 money, -1 morale, +2 prep

cards.name: Basement Startup
cards.text: +0.1 GPA, teleport to the Work Office or the Dormitory. You may play a card on the spot you land, but you may not move again.

cards.name: Post-Exam Party
cards.text: If you have >5 morale, gain +0.1 GPA, +1 morale.

cards.name: Viral Prank
cards.text: +20 money. You and another player of your choice switch places. Your turn is now over, so the spot you land on does not affect you nor can you play cards on it.

cards.name: Casino Run
cards.text: Roll a D6. 1, +1 Evil, -40 money. 2, -40 money. 3, -20 money. 4, +20 money, 5, +40 money. 6, +60 money.

cards.name: A Meaningful Conversation
cards.text: +1 morale. Choose an opponent. Look at their hand.

cards.name: Go on a Date
cards.text: +1 morale. Teleport another player to the same space as you, and take 10 money from them.

cards.name: Going on a Date
cards.text: Lose half your money. Your morale is set to 10.

cards.name: Actually Trying
cards.text: +3 preparation. You are released from Office Hours and may take your turn normally.
